## QueryOptions.refetchIntervalInBackground property

If set to `true`<!-- -->, the query will continue to refetch while their tab/window is in the background. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
refetchIntervalInBackground?: boolean;
```
